,,,,,,,,,,      Source : Central Bank of Sri Lanka,,,
,"(a) Includes 5 Municipal Councils (Colombo, Dehiwala-Mount Lavinia, Sri Jayawardenapura, Moratuwa and Kaduwela), 7 Urban Councils ( Wattala-Mabole, Peliyagoda, Panadura, ",,,,,,,,,,,,
,"     Maharagama, Kesbewa, Horana and Boralesgamuwa) and 8 Pradeshiya Sabha (Homagama, Kotikawatta-Mulleriyawa, Kelaniya, Attanagalla, Wattala-Mabole, Horana, Panadura",,,,,,,,,,,,
,     and Mahara),,,,,,,,,,,,
,"* From 2005, Mahara Pradeshiya Sabha is included",,,,,,,,,,,,
,"**In 2007, Oyabadaperuwa sub office is excluded",,,,,,,,,,,,
,"*** From the 3rd quarter of 2011 onwards, Kaduwela Pradeshiya Sabha is re-categorised as Kaduwela Municipal Council",,,,,,,,,,,,
